Dear Steve,

Thank you for all you have done, all the inventions and all the amazing devices!
Your legend will live on forever through the hearts of millions. As a wise man once said, 
"I think if you do something and it turns out pretty good, then you should go do something else wonderful, not dwell on it for too long. Just figure out whatâ€™s next."

You are a spirit that will live on forever.

Thank You.
